page.title: 17SCHOOL LIFE IN A TOWN
page.content: I have just moved to Adderley from Ashford Middlesex .I went to a large school.Every morning when the bell went we lined up outside the school.We went into the building, and through the cloakroom to hang up our coats. Our desks were very old and tatty.If it was Wednesday, Thursday or Friday we would have gone to Assembly. If it was Monday morning we would do Comprehension, and if we didn't do it before play we would have to stay in.After play we did Maths.For dinner we would line up outside. There were four dinner ladies one was also the school nurse.In the afternoon sometimes we would have French then Physical Education.After last play we finished off any work.We went home at half past three.
